entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:17 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 10:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %

Dewpoint: -24.8°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25 except minus 31 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25 except minus 31 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 21.
